concept: abandoned cathedral with crumbling pillars and broken stained glass
description: A vast ruined cathedral with gothic arches, featuring multiple levels connected by broken stairs. The main hall has collapsed sections revealing the sky, with scattered debris and overgrown vegetation. Dark ambient lighting filters through shattered stained glass windows.

player_pathfinding.description: upper balcony access via broken stairs

vertical_elements: collapsed bell tower with climbable rubble
narrative_hints: shattered stained glass depicting ancient battles
collapsed altar with old prayer books
